name: Cox's Bazar
text: Cox's Bazar is the longest unbroken sandy beach in the world, 125 km in length. It is the most popular tourist spot among the locals in Bangladesh. Its Perfect place for relax

name: Sundarbans Mangrove Forest
text: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest on earth and a UNESCO world heritage site. Sundarban is located in between tow neighboring countries - Bangladesh and India.

name: St. Martin's Island
text: St. Martin's Island is a beautiful coral island of the Bay of Bengal in Bangladesh. For Beach lovers, this is the best place to visit in Bangladesh. Local tourists go to visit this island mostly on a day trip.

name: Rangamati
text: Rangamati is a district of the Chittagong Hill-Tracts area. The main reason to visit this place is Kaptai Lake. It is a naturally beautiful man-made lake surrounded by beautiful hills.

name: Srimangal
text: Srimangal is the tea capital of Bangladesh. This hilly area, with tea estates, lemon orchards, pineaple and rubber plantations is one of the most enjoyable parts of the country.
